name: seniorlove-back

scripts.db:populate: node data/populate_tables_users.js && psql -U senior -d senior -f data/populate_tables_1.sql && psql -U senior -d senior -f data/populate_tables_2.sql
scripts.db:reset: pnpm run db:create && node data/populate_tables_users.js && psql -U senior -d senior -f data/populate_tables_1.sql && psql -U senior -d senior -f data/populate_tables_2.sql

author: Coada EMILIAN, Thomas BAZIN, Widi MARTIAL, Oliva DRUYER, Kevin LEVEQUE
